class.name: com.cardiodx.db.waban.table.MenuItem
class.comment: Information about dynamic menus used in the GTLIMS application

column.name: PARENT_MENU_ID
column.comment: Name of the parent menu that this menu item will appear. Values can be File, Lab Setup, Study Setup, Sample, Container, Results, or Tools.

column.name: OCX_LOAD_ID
column.comment: foreign key to functional pack stored in ocx_load table

column.name: CAPTION
column.comment: Text of the menu item to appear in the menu

column.name: OCX_NAME
column.comment: Name of the external Active-X control that will be loaded when the menu is selected.

column.name: URL_NAME
column.comment: Name of URL to be loaded in browser for menu item

column.name: SCREEN_NAME
column.comment: Name of screen in application to be loaded by menu item

column.name: MODAL
column.comment: Indicator used to open screen in modal mode

column.name: ICON_NAME
column.comment: Name of icon used in menu

column.name: ICON_BLOB
column.comment: blob used to store icon displayed in menu
